document.full_text: members of kyrgyzstan's divided parliament slaughtered seven rams before their morning session, a sacrifice that they said they hoped would banish 'evil spirits' disrupting their work.
document.title: asia: kyrgyzstan: a sacrifice to save democracy
lines_and_colors: members of kyrgyzstan's divided parliament slaughtered seven rams before their morning session, a sacrifice that they said they hoped would banish 'evil spirits' disrupting their work.
